defaults.__comment: You can disable defaults by setting these to false. Do *NOT* try to add additional entries here. You can add additional entries in the custom section.

defaults payment.__comment: You can define custom payment items for the default entries here.

defaults amount.__comment: You can define custom amounts for the default entries here.

custom entries.__comment: You can define additional items to be sold by the Market here. Defaults can be overridden. Prefix with ! to blacklist instead.
